title: Adoption: children are waiting
creator_credit: Laurie Jennings, Lee Gordon, National Film Board of Canada and Westminster Films
brief_description: This film will inform and encourage prospective adopting parents and be helpful to professionals in the child-welfare field. In interviews, three couples relate their experiences of adopting older or handicapped children. A fourth couple explains how they, as foster parents, try to prepare children emotionally for adoption.
